mapper.insert: insert into Bd_BOARD (MEMBER_NO, TITLE, CONTENT) VALUES (#{memberNo}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.select: select MEMBER_NAME from Cu_MEMBER as a left outer join Bd_BOARD as b on a.MEMBER_NO = b.MEMBER_NO where a.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}

select MEMBER_NAME as memberName ,BOARD_NO as boardNo ,TITLE as title ,a.REG_DATE as bregDate from Bd_BOARD as a inner join Cu_MEMBER as b on a.MEMBER_NO = b.MEMBER_NO ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageSize} ROWS ONLY
select MEMBER_NAME, HIT, a.REG_DATE, a.UPDATE_DATE, TITLE, CONTENT FROM Bd_BOARD as a inner join Cu_MEMBER as b on a.MEMBER_NO = b.MEMBER_NO where BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
